metadata.ground_truth: All the reviews regarding noise at University Arms Hotel were negative. The reviews at Gonville Hotel were mixed with the room being described as both noisy and quiet. Would you prefer to book the Gonville Hotel?
metadata.predicted: The Gonville Hotel is known to have a lot of noise, while the University Arms Hotel has a quiet environment.

conversation.content: I am looking got a hotel near the centre and I need to it have free wifi.

The Gonville Hotel is known to have a lot of noise, while the University Arms Hotel has a quiet environment.

Two people for 3 nights, thank you. I'll pull current rates and availability for those dates at University Arms. Bye <END>
